channel.title: Pages on Automated Reporting and Data Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Automated Reporting and Data Analysis

item.title: About
item.description: This website hosts a weekly summary report for the German Top 100 Single Charts. The data gathering, report generation and subsequent posting of the report takes places fully automatically through R. This is possible by combining the blogdown package that is focused on creating website from within R with dynamic markdown generation, version control, and task scheduling with the taskscheduleR package. blogdown is a Hugo-based website generator that creates static websites.
